format:
A 8-by-13 matrix of 7 colors with four fading scales: blue,
green, pink, yellow, red, black, gray, and light gray.
title: Introduction to Modern Statistics (IMS) Colors
description:
Description
These are the core colors used for the Introduction to Modern Statistics textbook.
The blue, green, pink, yellow, and red colors are also gray-scaled, meaning no
changes are required when printing black and white copies.
